activities.name: Build Migration table for Process Strategies

source.query:
drop table if exists migration_portalProcess_strategy;

create table migration_portalProcess_strategy AS
(
    with temp as 
    (
        select
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION by m.department_id, mfe.function_id order by mfe.siteType, CASE when (l.newSiteId is not null) then 0 else 1 end, rto.seconds ) row_num_internal
        , m.id matrix_id
        , m.name matrixName
        , mfe.siteType
        , mfe.site_id
        , mfe.function_id
        , f.name functionName
        , m.department_id
        , mfe.rto_id
        , pp.portalProcessId
        , pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
        , l.newSiteId locationId
        , rto.seconds
        from T_BIA_MATRIX m
        join T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY mfe on m.id = mfe.matrix_id
        join t_function f on f.id = mfe.function_id
        join migration_portalfunctionalArea_data pfa on pfa.department_id = m.department_id
        join migration_portalProcess_data pp on pp.function_id = mfe.function_Id and pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
        left join migration_site_data l on l.id = mfe.site_id
        left join migration_rto_intervals rto on rto.id = mfe.rto_id
    )

    select
    ROW_NUMBER() over (order by portalProcessId) row_num
    , uuid() newPortalProcessStrategyId
    , case when temp.portalProcessLocationId is null
        then '9c004e84-4eb4-44f1-a008-cd33f5211014' /*wfh (Work from Anywhere)*/
        else '704acb8f-ed9b-4f11-ab37-0f0139895d5b' /*Temporary Workspace*/
        end strategyTypeId
    , temp.*
    from temp
    where row_num_internal = 1
);

select 'DONE' as 'Lookup Activity Hack';

dependsOn.activity: Build Migration table for Process Strategies
